bike.description: Surly Ogre, Surly 4130 CroMoly steel. Main triangle double-butted. TIG-welded

components.description: Surly Ogre, TIG-welded 4130 CroMoly, 80mm suspension corrected, tapered and butted straight blade. Low- and mid-blade fully threaded through-blade rack eyelets; fender mount eyelets at dropout; 1-1/8˝ x 260mm threadless steer tube, 51mm disc mount (203mm max. rotor diameter), removable cantilever pivots, line/housing guides; two sets of bottle cage mounts, each height adjustable (note: cages cannot be used on fork with some racks, and vice versa)
Avid BB7, Cable actuated. 180/160mm rotors front & rear
WTB SST Comp, Steel rails. Black vinyl. Feels pretty o.k.
Surly stainless steel post clamp. 14g DT Swiss spokes
Shimano Deore Disc M525, 32h. QR. Black
